channel.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Abilities that change a player's targets will no longer work against occupy immune players. * Aftermath has been disabled for now.
## Apostle: * Faint Whispers now allows the Cult to whisper to one another without anyone seeing notifications. Now has 2 uses * Added Mind Warp. Has 2 uses.
## Butler & Servant: * Concentrated Wine has been changed to now occupy all visiting players. Still 2 uses.
## Court Wizard: * Magical Barrier now prevents negative effects at night. Does not block kills or converts. * Ice Ward no longer occupies and will work on occupy immune targets. Now has 2 uses.
## Invoker: * Strings of Mithras now has 2 uses.
## King: * Royal Finger no longer has a cooldown.
## Prince:
* Can no longer execute on the first night.
## Poacher: * Removed Retribution. * Bear Companion now has 4 uses. * Snare Traps has been changed to Snare Trap. It now occupies a single player for 2 nights if they leave their room.
## Reaper: * Starts with a soul.
## Seeker: * Identify now has 2 uses.
## Lobby: * Revamped the "My Account" section with polish * Added "Redeem Code" feat in-game, although it does nothing now (for backers + alpha players later)
## Bug Fixes: * Possible fix to the UI timers being stuck. * Steam Login screen button no longer makes a sound on hover when disabled. * Customize section is now bug-free * Learn to Play and Guide popups in lobby now opens in a better location * Simpler wording for some buttons, such as "Start" * Some others.

item.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
What is the prize for being a Alpha player?

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Added to changelog:

Lobby:

Revamped the “My Account” section with polish
Added “Redeem Code” to in-game, although it does nothing now (backers + alpha players will use this later)

Bug Fixes:

  • Steam Login screen button no longer makes a so* und on hover when disabled.
  • Customize section is now bug-free
  • Learn to Play and Guide popups in lobby now opens in a better location
  • Simpler wording for some buttons, such as “Start”

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Love the CW change. Love the King change.

Can’t wait!

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Apostle buff sounds amazing.

Court Wizard changes seem quite good, excepting the fact that the two night abilities are now quite similar.

Poacher improvements are obviously great.

Another good update here.

Dang I can’t wait to actually play this again.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.4 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
General:

  • Abilities that change a player’s targets will no longer work against occupy immune players.
  • Aftermath has been disabled for now.

Apostle:

  • Faint Whispers now allows the Cult to whisper to one another without anyone seeing notifications. Now has 2 uses
  • Added Mind Warp. Has 2 uses.

Butler & Servant:

  • Concentrated Wine has been changed to now occupy all visiting players. Still 2 uses.

Court Wizard:

  • Magical Barrier now prevents negative effects at night. Does not block kills or converts.
  • Ice Ward no longer occupies and will work on occupy immune targets. Now has 2 uses.

Invoker:

  • Strings of Mithras now has 2 uses.

King:

  • Royal Finger no longer has a cooldown.

Prince:

  • Can no longer execute on the first night.

Poacher:

  • Removed Retribution.
  • Bear Companion now has 4 uses.
  • Snare Traps has been changed to Snare Trap. It now occupies a single player for 2 nights if they leave their room.

Reaper:

  • Starts with a soul.

Seeker:

  • Identify now has 2 uses.

Lobby:

  • Revamped the “My Account” section with polish
  • Added “Redeem Code” feat in-game, although it does nothing now (for backers + alpha players later)

Bug Fixes:

  • Possible fix to the UI timers being stuck.
  • Steam Login screen button no longer makes a sound on hover when disabled.
  • Customize section is now bug-free
  • Learn to Play and Guide popups in lobby now opens in a better location
  • Simpler wording for some buttons, such as “Start”
  • Some others.
